医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
盐可以增强 T 细胞的抗肿瘤反应肿瘤中钠水平升高可增强 T 细胞代谢适应性和细胞毒性，揭示改善癌症治疗的潜在途径。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Salt-can-boost-antitumor-responses-of-T-cells.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Salt-can-boost-antitumor-responses-of-T-cells.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b09cbae9-0464-4886-a867-5dcf6f7b8159 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 08:19:00 -0400 Salt can boost antitumor responses of T cells
新型药物输送系统旨在预防顺铂化疗引起的听力损失化疗药物顺铂是许多被诊断患有癌症的成人和儿童的救星，但它经常导致听力损失，这种副作用会降低治疗后的生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Novel-drug-delivery-system-aims-to-prevent-hearing-loss-from-cisplatin-chemotherapy-The-Chemotherapy-Drug-Cis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Novel-drug-delivery-system-aims-to-prevent-hearing-loss-from-cisplatin-chemotherapy-The-Chemotherapy-Drug-Cis.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=26f44c3b-51e9-4392-985a-c54475df5efa Fri, 13 Sep 2024 07:51:00 -0400 Novel drug delivery system aims to prevent hearing loss from cisplatin chemotherapy
研究强调索马鲁肽对肾功能受损的超重成年人的心血管益处抗肥胖药物索马鲁肽可能有助于预防心脏病、中风和其他主要不良心血管事件 (MACE)，以及未患有糖尿病的超重或肥胖成年人的死亡，无论他们是否肾功能受损，根据将于今年在马德里举行的欧洲糖尿病研究协会 (EASD) 年会（9 月 9 日至 13 日）上公布的新研究。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Research-highlights-cardioangio-benefits-of-semaglutide-for-overweight-adults-with-impaired-kidney-function.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Research-highlights-cardioangio-benefits-of-semaglutide-for-overweight-adults-with-impaired-kidney-function.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a1272fd2-ee42-4057-a410-645822be0efa Fri, 13 Sep 2024 07:39:00 -0400 Research highlights cardiovascular benefits of semaglutide for overweight adults with impaired kidney function
事实证明，大分割对于乳腺癌治疗来说更安全、更方便《英国医学杂志》今天发表的一项研究发现，与传统疗法相比，乳腺癌手术后在更短的时间内给予更高剂量的放射治疗可显着降低副作用风险并提高生活质量。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Hypofractionation-proven-safer-and-more-convenient-for-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/Hypofractionation-proven-safer-and-more-convenient-for-breast-cancer-treatment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d76da85f-67dd-432a-875f-04ce601d7a70 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 07:26:22 -0400 Hypofractionation proven safer and more convenient for breast cancer treatment

“三个月后会发生什么？”佐治亚高中枪击事件后的心理健康阿巴拉奇高中发生枪声大约一小时后，救护车开始抵达附近的巴罗东北佐治亚医疗中心，救护车上载着两名学生和两名成年人，他们患有恐慌症和极度焦虑，而不是枪伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/e28098What-happens-third-months-from-nowe28099-Mental-health-after-Georgia-High-School-shooting.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240913/e28098What-happens-third-months-from-nowe28099-Mental-health-after-Georgia-High-School-shooting.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=aca95f61-e20b-4a4a-9b4f-1aabfa331f66 Fri, 13 Sep 2024 06:38:12 -0400 ‘What happens three months from now?’ Mental health after Georgia High School shooting

重大的全球心血管风险与高脂蛋白（a）水平有关《柳叶刀》的评论发现，全球五分之一的人面临患心血管疾病的风险，因为他们携带高水平特定脂蛋白的遗传风险，这种脂蛋白可以进行检测并可能进行治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Significant-global-cardiovian-risk-linked-to-high-lipo Protein(a)-levels.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240912/Significant-global-cardioangio-risk-linked-to-high-lipo Protein(a)-levels.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5561cdcf-5625-4a2f-b141-a4316ad1d506 Thu, 12 Sep 2024 22:33:09 -0400 Significant global cardiovascular risk linked to high lipoprotein(a) levels
